channel.title: Netscalers on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Netscalers on SoftLayer API

item.title: backup_netscaler.py
item.description: """ NetScalers Backups Example to take Netscalers backups, the script will list all the Netscalers in the account and will look for an specific Netscaler in order to take a backup Important manual pages http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller/saveCurrentConfiguration http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller https://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Account/getApplicationDeliveryControllers https://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Account/ """ import SoftLayer # Your SoftLayer API username and key. USERNAME = 'set me' API_KEY = 'set me' # The name of the netscaler you wish take the backup netscalerName = "SLADC208473-1" # Declare the API client and creating the services that we need client = SoftLayer.
